org.whired.ghost.net
Interface Receivable

All Known Subinterfaces:
GhostUser
All Known Implementing Classes:
GhostFrame, GhostFrameImpl, GhostFrameUI, GhostUserImpl
public interface Receivable

This interface is used to provide applicable classes with the means to handle information that is received from a network stream.

Method Summary
 boolean handlePacket(int packetId, int packetLength, Connection connection)
          Called when information is received
 

Method Detail

handlePacket

boolean handlePacket(int packetId,
                     int packetLength,
                     Connection connection)
Called when information is received

Parameters:
packetId - the ID of the packet that was received
inputStream - the stream from which the packet was received
Returns:
true if the packet was handled, otherwise false
